BuildTab.AddPosTooltip: Adds a MoveTo step to the path, AutoDuty will Move to the specified position
BuildTab.AddActionTooltip: Opens the Add Action popup menu to add action steps to the path
BuildTab.ClearPathTooltip: Clears the entire path, NOTE: there is no confirmation
BuildTab.SavePathTooltip: Saves the path to the path file specified or the default
BuildTab.SavePathError: You must add at least one action to save the path, please add an action and try again
BuildTab.DataIdError: {0}'s must be uint's corresponding to the objects DataId
BuildTab.NotInDungeonMessage: You must enter a dungeon to Build a Path
